TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WSDualHttpBindingElement extends System.ServiceModel.Configuration.StandardBindingElement

summary.span: 表示安全且可互操作的绑定的配置元素，该绑定适合于双工服务协定或通过 SOAP 媒介进行的通信。

span.span: Represents the configuration element for a secure and interoperable binding that is suitable for duplex service contracts or communication through SOAP intermediaries.

remarks.format: ## Remarks wsDualHttpBinding 是一个适合于双工服务协定的安全、可靠且可互操作的绑定。The wsDualHttpBinding is a secure, reliable, interoperable binding suitable for duplex service contracts. 默认情况下，它会生成一个运行时堆栈，该堆栈包含 WS-ReliableMessaging 以保证可靠性，包含 WS-Security 以保证消息安全性和进行身份验证，包含 HTTP 以便进行消息传递，并且包含 Text/XML 消息编码功能。By default, it generates a run-time stack with WS-ReliableMessaging for reliability, WS-Security for message security and authentication, HTTP for message delivery, and a Text/XML message encoding. 此绑定要求客户端具有公共 URI。This binding requires that the client has a public URI. 使用它可以通过一个或多个 SOAP 媒介可靠地进行通信。It can be used to communicate reliably through one or more SOAP intermediaries.

span.span: wsDualHttpBinding Element

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Uri ^ ClientBaseAddress { Uri ^ get(); void set(Uri ^ value); };
member this.ClientBaseAddress : Uri with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个 URI，该 URI 指定客户端为接收来自服务的响应消息而侦听的基址。

span.span: Gets or sets a URI that specifies the base address the client listens to for response messages from the service.

value.span: 一个 URI，指定客户端为接收来自服务的响应消息而侦听的基址。

span.span: A URI that specifies the base address that the client listens to for response messages from the service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果此属性具有值，则此地址（加上每个通道的 GUID）会用于侦听。If this property has a value, this address (plus a GUID for each channel) is used for listening. 否则，将以传输特定的方式生成客户端基址。Otherwise, the client base address is generated in a transport-specific manner.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::ServiceModel::HostNameComparisonMode HostNameComparisonMode { System::ServiceModel::HostNameComparisonMode get(); void set(System::ServiceModel::HostNameComparisonMode value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置用于分析 URI 的 HTTP 主机名比较模式。

span.span: Gets or sets the HTTP hostname comparison mode used to parse URIs.

value.span: 一个有效的 值，该值指定在对 URI 进行匹配时，是否使用主机名来访问服务。

span.span: A valid value that specifies whether the hostname is used to reach the service when matching on the URI.

value.span: 默认值为 ，表示忽略匹配项中的主机名。

span.span: The default value is , which ignores the hostname in the match.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property long MaxBufferPoolSize { long get(); void set(long value); };
member this.MaxBufferPoolSize : int64 with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置可为特定消息缓冲区管理器（该管理器在配置了此绑定的终结点接收消息）分配的最大内存量（以字节为单位）。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum amount of memory, in bytes, that can be allocated for the message buffer manager, which receives messages at the endpoints configured with this binding.

value.span: 配置了此绑定的终结点所使用的缓冲池的最大大小（以字节为单位）。

span.span: The maximum size, in bytes, for the pool of buffers used by an endpoint configured with this binding.

value.span: 默认值为 524288 字节。

span.span: The default value is 524288 bytes.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property long MaxReceivedMessageSize { long get(); void set(long value); };
member this.MaxReceivedMessageSize : int64 with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置配置了此绑定配置的通道上可以接收的消息的最大大小（以字节为单位）。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum size, in bytes, for a message that can be received on a channel configured with this binding.

value.span: 绑定可处理的最大消息大小（以字节为单位）。

span.span: The maximum size, in bytes, for a message that is processed by the binding.

value.span: 默认值为 65,536 字节。

span.span: The default value is 65,536 bytes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 类的服务能够在网络上接收的消息的大小受到为每个消息分配的内存量的限制。The size of the messages that can be received on the wire by services using the class is bounded by the amount of memory allocated for each message. 对消息大小进行的此限制旨在降低遭受拒绝服务 (DoS) 攻击的可能性。This bound on message size is intended to limit exposure to DoS-style attacks. 请注意， 和 的设置都是本地行为设置。Note that the settings for and , are local behavioral settings. 这表示它们不会传输到元数据中的其他终结点。This means that they are not transmitted to other endpoints in metadata. 如果为元数据中一个最大消息大小为 2GB 的服务生成了一个代理，则该代理的最大消息大小仍为默认的 64K。If you generate a proxy to a service with a maximum message size of 2GB from metadata, the proxy still has a default value 64K. 这样就使对消息和消息缓冲区大小进行适当限制的控制权处在本地管理员的管辖范围内。This leaves control of the appropriate bounds for message and message buffer size in the scope of local administrators.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: Gets or set a URI that specifies the address of the HTTP proxy.

value.span: 一个指定 HTTP 代理的地址的 URI。

span.span: A URI that specifies the address of the HTTP proxy.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 属性设置为 `true`，则该属性的值被忽略。If the property is set to `true`, the value of this property is ignored.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ReaderQuotas As XmlDictionaryReaderQuotasElement

summary.span: 获取或设置可由配置了此绑定的终结点处理的 SOAP 消息的复杂性约束。

span.span: Gets or sets constraints on the complexity of SOAP messages that can be processed by endpoints configured with this binding.

value.span: 指定复杂性约束的 。

span.span: The that specifies the complexity constraints.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 复杂性约束包括多个项，例如最大元素深度、消息中的字符串内容的最大长度等。The complexity constraints include items such as a maximum element depth, or a maximum length for string content within the message. 这些约束可以抵御某种类型的拒绝服务 (DOS) 攻击，这些攻击试图利用消息复杂性来占用终结点处理资源。The constraints protect against a type of denial of service (DOS) attacks that attempt to use message complexity to tie up endpoint processing resources.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ReliableSession As StandardBindingReliableSessionElement

summary.span: 获取一个配置元素，该元素指定是否为配置了此绑定的终结点启用可靠会话。

span.span: Gets a configuration element that specifies whether reliable sessions are enabled for the endpoint configured with this binding.

value.span: 一个 ，指定是否为配置了此绑定的终结点启用可靠会话。

span.span: An that specifies whether reliable sessions are enabled for the endpoint configured with this binding.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 配置了 wsDualHttpBinding 绑定的服务要求使用可靠会话。A reliable session is required for services configured with wsDualHttpBinding binding.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个布尔值，该值指定绑定是否支持流动 WS-Transactions。

value.span: 如果绑定支持流动 WS-Transactions，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the binding supports flowing WS-Transactions; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认值指定客户端不对事务进行流处理，并且服务拒绝带有流事务消息头的消息。The default value specifies that clients do not flow transactions and services reject messages with a flowed transaction message header.
